title: DeFi for Institutions | Full Event
content: The DeFi Alliance and KPMG in partnership with The Block hosted a half day event exploring the intersection of DeFi and Institutions. This 4 hour event featured some of the world’s leading investors, builders, and regulators shaping the future of finance.
You can watch each segment and learn more about our panelists below.
About DeFi Alliance

The DeFi Alliance is the leading decentralized finance accelerator. We help startups source liquidity and support from a broad industry network — the DeFi Alliance Network — that includes trading firms, founders, and investors. Together, we will grow DeFi to one billion users by 2025.
About KPMG Cryptoasset Services

The KPMG Cryptoasset Services practice helps banks, fintechs, and other financial services institutions develop and optimize core capabilities to engage with the growing ecosystem of crypto customers. We leverage our KPMG Chain Fusion suite of accelerators to help our clients deliver institutional quality cryptoasset capabilities and services.

Leveraging leading technology and frameworks, our services are designed to help clients accelerate trusted adoption of core crypto asset capabilities through a consistent data architecture that supports seamless business engagement across protocols.”
